price: Rantsuwa da* rãyuwarka! Lalle ne sũ a cikin mãyensu sunã ta ɗĩmuwa.
footnotes: * Allah Yã yi rantsuwã da rãyuwar Annabi Muhammadu, tsĩrã da amincin Allah su tabbata a gare shi. Wannan shĩ ne matuƙar girmamãwar wadda Allah Yake yi wa mutum. Kuma yanã nũna cewa rãyuwar Annabi tanã da muhimmanci ƙwarai.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
